name: Trick on Cheat
description:
Trick on Cheat 
STORY:  this is about a poor man looking for ways to survive each Halloween night. The old man must give the right candy to the child who asks for it without being fooled

Gameplay: Heavily inspired by Paper Please, Knock Knock Knock, Who's at door, Trick on Treat
 (Please play in fullscreen mode :( otherwise it will not correctly responsive )
